title: 各位大哥的开学时间
author: 浩厉害
txt_content:
各位大佬敢问开学时间何时  
我反正这个学期不开学了

replies.author: Drowned64
replies.txt_content:
布吉岛
本来是6·8的

replies.author: Minecraft.Wnxi
replies.txt_content: 一个月之前就开学了。
早开学了，都上课快两个月了

replies.author: 深拥v
replies.txt_content: 那挺好的，我们日常自习

replies.author: 社会你龍哥
replies.txt_content: 不开学+1

replies.author: TheSuncommand
replies.txt_content:
羡慕你们这些不开学的
我早开学几个月了

replies.author: 独行
replies.txt_content: 哦 我已经开学了 再过十几天就期末了 应该问放假时间了

replies.author: Lucio057
replies.txt_content: 6.1开的 在学校半个月了 qaq

replies.author: 大便上的牙印
replies.txt_content: 我们都开学一个月了

replies.author: 郁离子
replies.txt_content: 我们4月13日就开了，呜呜呜！

replies.author: t19950810
replies.txt_content: 早就来学了

replies.author: 年华々幻想
replies.txt_content: 早开了五月十一

replies.author: 梦羽吖
replies.txt_content: 我还没有开学，而你们都快放假了

replies.author: cuiyinpeng
replies.txt_content: 牛批，感谢楼主，楼主辛苦,...

replies.author: 永远Eternally
replies.txt_content: 前几天不是有人已经开学了吗 你还没开学吗

replies.author: 曦灬月
replies.txt_content: 开学两个月了

replies.author: Yang酱
replies.txt_content: 我们这学期不开学

replies.author: JAS00
replies.txt_content: 6.8开学，上了一个星期就停课了

replies.author: tanjiahao
replies.txt_content: 早就开学了都放假了

replies.author: 热心阿金
replies.txt_content: 我四月二十几号就进校了，然后现在都还没放。。。。

replies.author: ecolid
replies.txt_content: 早就开了hhhh

replies.author: WYL0zhu
replies.txt_content: 早就开学了。

replies.author: mc三十万
replies.txt_content: 不开学了，已经回不去学校了
